alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 9:17AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake Whisky Chitto Creek Near Mittie Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 930 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Fork of The Calcasieu River at Sam Houston Jones SP. * WHEN...From Thursday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 6.5 feet, Portions of South Perkins Ferry Road become impassable. Recreational areas in Sam Houston Jones State Park are under water, including the playground and campsites nearest the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday morning and continue rising to a crest of 6.0 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri West Fork of The Calcasieu River Sam Houston Jones SP 5.0 MSG unknown 3.3 5.3 6.0 &&
